alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ouachita Parish through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sterlington to near Claiborne to 11 miles west of Brownsville-Bawcom. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Drew, Fondale, Fairbanks, Perryville, Calhoun, Millhaven, Folksville, Cheniere, Mineral Springs, Pine Grove, Guthrie and Deshard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
